TopicTitle: I need to ask your opinion...

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I've got two KSP videos up now, the second one uploaded just earlier today. Shameless self-promotion aside, I need to ask your opinion about something.

I am in a position where I should have the full version of Fraps by tomorrow. That means I can do Scott Manley-esque videos! So, so I know what to start off with, I would like to ask: What should I do first? Try some challenges? Tutorials? Show off what I can do?

I want the people who watch my videos to have some control over what I produce! I will be running two Danny2462-styled skits while I get the long-term and narrated video thing under control.

Thanks a million! Every bit helps!

-Maximus97
Show what you can do and what are you doing most in the game (Just crashing? Or missions...? )
Hmm, maybe I could do a career mode Let's Play...
